name: Lair of the Spider Queen
description:
Lair of the Spider Queen

Instructions:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Left click to shoot web
  • Right click to attack
  • F or NumPad 0 to lay eggs
  • Rope enemies to create cocoons
  • Spiderlings will burrow into cocoons to mature
  • Boss spawns after 50 goblins.
  • Kill the boss to win!

Tips:

  • Always be laying eggs
  • Create as many cocoons as you can, they distract goblins and act as meat shields.
  • Protect your spiders if you can, you will need them to defeat the boss

Game by ChrisLR

Art by DragonDePlatino & DawnBringer

Music by JDB ARTIST

Made for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT game jam
